channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: States are preparing to help or thwart Trump’s second-term plans
1/11: CBS Weekend News
item.description: New evacuations ordered as stubborn Palisades Fire expands east in Los Angeles; California communities step up to help fire victims

item.title: Los Angeles County medical examiner’s office confirms wildfire death toll rises to 16
item.description: The Los Angeles County medical examiner’s office says the confirmed death toll from the wildfires ravaging the area has risen to 16.

item.title: Here's how to help wildfire victims as California blazes explode in size
item.description: Strong Santa Ana winds are fueling multiple wildfires across Southern California, forcing thousands of residents to flee from their homes.

item.title: These companies are pledging millions in funds, supplies to help LA fire victims
item.description: Major corporations, including Disney and Target, have announced pledges to help the growing number of people affected by the LA wildfires.

item.title: Struggling to keep your New Year's resolutions? Here's how to keep yourself on track
item.description: Why do millions make New Year's resolutions knowing the odds of them ever following through with them are minimal? Fitness expert Jasper Rook Williams...

item.title: Canada's former leader Chrétien has blunt advice for Trump: 'Give your head a shake!'

Apple's board recommends shareholders vote against proposal to eliminate diversity programs
Powerful winter storm across Southern U.S. maintains its icy grip
item.description: Temperatures plunged in some areas turning melting snow into ice and turning roadways treacherous.

item.title: Jack Smith has resigned as special counsel, Justice Department says in court filing
item.description: Jack Smith, who led the Jan. 6 and classified documents probes into Donald Trump, has formally resigned as special counsel.

item.title: California fires live updates: 16 fire-related deaths, medical examiner says
item.description: More than a dozen people are believed to be dead and many more injured as several fires broke out across Southern California amid historically dry and...

item.title: Californians scrambled to evacuate dogs, cats, horses, even pigs as LA flames closed in

item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: TV bailiff accused in wife's shooting death: "I didn't pull the trigger"
item.description: Renard Spivey says he was trying to protect himself when he says his wife Patricia confronted him at gunpoint in their Houston home.
